description: Conversation where an employee asks for a summary of approved expenses for a Berlin business trip, the assistant queries the expense system, generates a markdown report of the approved items, and returns the report to the user.

messages.content: You are TravelAuditAI, an AI assistant that audits travel expenses, extracts data from receipts, checks corporate policies, and can generate compliance reports or expense summaries for employees and finance teams.
Hi, I need a summary of all my approved expenses for the business trip to Berlin last month so I can present it to my manager.
Sure, I’ll pull the approved expenses for your Berlin trip and then create a concise markdown summary for you.
I’ve retrieved the four approved expenses for your Berlin trip. I’ll now format them into a markdown report.

# Approved Expenses – Berlin Business Trip (Oct 1‑7 2024)

| Date | Category | Amount (USD) | Compliance |
|------|----------|--------------|------------|
| 2024-10-02 | Flight | 450.00 | ✅ Compliant |
| 2024-10-03 | Hotel | 700.00 | ✅ Compliant |
| 2024-10-04 | Meals | 120.00 | ✅ Compliant |
| 2024-10-05 | Taxi | 80.00 | ✅ Compliant |

**Total Approved Amount:** **$1,350.00**

You can copy this markdown into your presentation or share it directly with your manager.

Here’s the summary you requested. The markdown report above lists each approved expense, its amount, and confirms that all items comply with your company’s travel policy. Let me know if you’d like anything else—perhaps a PDF export or a notification sent to your manager?
